TopicTitle: /Looking for more aesthetically pleasing landing legs.

Articles.Content: Anyone know where I can find some? I've searched curse and can't find anything. Looking for something that folds flush into the part it's attached to.
B9 and Karbonite both has landing legs that comes with their own pods where they retract into. If you want actual hidden legs though, you gonna need custom parts with built-in landing legs.
I know NearFutureConstruction also has a landing leg with a pod.
I like the landing legs in the NovaPunch pack as well.
I feel like I've heard about spacek having landing legs.
